title: 12-day group tour of Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Cairo + Alexandria in Egypt (5-Star)
description: [Official Flagship Star Pure Play Tour] Maximum of 25 people | Includes visa, tips, and full meals | 3 nights on the Nile River cruise + 3 nights at an all-inclusive Red Sea resort + 1 night in the ancient city of Thebes | Upgraded domestic flights | High-quality Chinese-speaking tour guides | Seven major temples + complimentary items
features:
[2020 Self-Operated Upgrade Package: 5-Star Nile River Cruise + Red Sea Resort + Ancient Civilization Exploration 12-Day Inland Flight Boutique Tour]

[25 People Cap Small Group | Added Thebes Ancient Capital Stay | Free Special Projects | More Comfortable Itinerary]

*Best-selling with excellent reviews for years, over 6000 travelers with outstanding feedback! Routes can be copied, quality cannot be compared, images can be plagiarized, reviews cannot be imitated*


☆[Upgrade Explanation]The 2020 star product has been upgraded again. Egypt, a once-in-a-lifetime destination, should not only be viewed superficially. Apart from food, accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, and entertainment, the key is professional Chinese-speaking tour guides. Our high-quality team of Chinese-speaking guides, with whom we have cooperated for many years, will ensure that your trip is worthwhile!

Winter Heavy Upgrade · New Trends in Group Travel

☆【Group Size Cap】Group size capped at 25 people, say goodbye to overcrowded mega groups!
☆【Stay in Luxor】One night accommodation by the Nile in Luxor, experience the ancient city of Thebes privately!

☆【Extended Tour】Extended 3-hour tour of the Egyptian Museum, no regrets!

☆【Special Features】Enjoy a morning carriage ride through the ancient city of Thebes and understand why so many movies favor Luxor!
☆【Special Arrangement】Learn to draw hieroglyphs and create your own papyrus artwork! (One piece per person)

☆【Bus Upgrade】Groups with more than 16 tourists will be upgraded to a Mercedes-Benz bus! Nothing is more important than travel safety!

 Classic Nile River Cruise - Seven Great Temples + Five Major Attractions

☆【Special Themes】Nile River Cruise Through Millennia of Civilization + Romantic Red Sea Vacation + Ancient Civilization Exploration!
☆【Five Major Attractions】Cairo + Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Alexandria - A True Panorama Tour!
☆【Seven Great Temples】Visit Six Classic Temples (Exclusive to Two Cruises) + Optional Abu Simbel Temple!
☆【Important Sights】Pyramids + Sphinx + Egyptian Museum - Don't Miss Any!

☆【Cruise Accommodation】3 nights on the Nile River cruise, a quality cruise we have been cooperating with for years (River view standard room)!

☆【Red Sea Resort】3 nights at a designated excellent resort by the Red Sea, a true vacation experience!

☆【Upgraded Domestic Flight】Upgrade to a domestic flight instead of taking a night train without a shower!

 Worry-free booking and traveling  Includes essential fees such as visa fees over a thousand yuan

☆【Convenient Visa】Group visa on arrival, no original passport required, no documents needed!
☆【Includes Tips】Includes a 900 RMB tip for the guide service + Nile River cruise service fee!
☆【Worry-Free Meals】Includes full meals throughout Egypt, no self-arranged meals, worry-free!

☆【Safety Assurance】Years of cooperation with well-known local ground operators + high-quality licensed guide team!

☆【Service Equipment】In-car WiFi to meet your internet needs!


Special Notice: To enrich the travel experience, starting today, the Nile River sailing project will be replaced with a morning carriage tour of the ancient city of Thebes in Luxor. Changes will not be separately notified.

Chinese-speaking tour leader and local Chinese-speaking guide services

推荐活动参考 （需自费）
ActivityReference PriceDescription
Philae Temple Sound and Light Show$70 per person (2-5 people)$70 per person (2-5 people) $65 per person (6-9 people) $60 per person (10 or more people). The price includes: transportation, guide fee, and attraction tickets.
Pyramid Sound and Light Show$75 per person (2-5 people)Experience the historical grandeur of over 4,000 years ago with a modern combination of sound and light. Includes pickup and drop-off service, Chinese-speaking guide, and tickets.
$75 per person (2-5 people)
$65 per person (6 or more people)
Nile River Night Cruise$85 per person (4-9 people)Enjoy a nighttime cruise on the Nile River, admire the scenery on both sides, and have dinner on board (excluding alcoholic beverages). Enjoy local performances (performances are paused during Ramadan). Includes dock pickup and drop-off service, and Chinese-speaking guide service.
$85 per person (4-9 people)
$75 per person (10 or more people)
Abu Simbel Temple$145/personDepart around 4 AM, traveling to and from with a desert security team. Abu Simbel Temple is a highlight of Aswan. It was built by the great Pharaoh Ramses II of ancient Egypt and is a protected site from the New Kingdom era. Includes transportation, Chinese-speaking tour guide and explanation services, and entrance tickets.
$145/person (6-9 people)
$140/person (10-14 people)
$125/person (15 people and above)
Aswan Nubian Village Tour$50/person (4-7 people)Take a small boat to Aswan's unique "minority" village—Nubian Village. Experience the ancient Nubian civilization, visit the colorful houses of the Nubians, learn the local language, and tour the homes. Includes dock pickup and drop-off, Chinese-speaking tour guide, Nubian village special drinks, and camel rides.
$50/person (4-7 people)
$45/person (8 people and above)
4WD Desert Safari$90/person (4-7 people)Depart from the hotel around 2:30 PM in a 4WD vehicle, heading to the eastern desert for a unique sand dune experience. Enjoy the vast desert, climb sand dunes to watch the sunset, and visit an ancient Bedouin village to learn about their lifestyle. Experience camel rides and, if lucky, see a starry sky on the return trip.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4WD ride can be bumpy and carries certain risks; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully! Ensure safety when riding camels! If seat belts are not provided in the vehicle, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90/person (4-7 people)
$80/person (8 people and above)
Includes: 4x4 jeep fee, guide fee, entrance tickets, BBQ dinner.
Giftun Island Tour$80/person (10 people and above)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, and board a yacht to the beautiful Red Sea. Enjoy a private boat trip without sharing with other tourists. Feed seagulls, go fishing, or snorkel as you wish. The yacht provides snorkeling equipment and basic fishing gear. Enjoy a simple lunch on board. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking from the yacht. Queue properly, avoid crowding, and watch for slippery conditions. Do not perform risky actions until the captain and lifeguard give instructions. The yacht moves quickly and the sea can be rough; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$80/person (10 people and above)
Sinbad Submarine$115/person (2 people and above)Travel to the dock and take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Dive 7 meters deep into the Red Sea in a submarine to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to the pressure underwater, elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$115/person (2 people and above)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)Take a specially customized boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the wonderful underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.
Note:
Please pay attention to safety when boarding and disembarking; queue in an orderly manner, avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery areas.
$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile River. The boat is equipped with hot coffee, tea, and snacks. Ride the hot air balloon to watch the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different view of Luxor from the sky, passing by Habou Temple, the Temple of the Queen, and the Valley of the Kings. A small celebration ceremony will be held after landing, and certificates will be awarded to guests. A special car will return you to the hotel.
Special Notes:
1. Hot air ballooning is a high-risk activity; please choose to participate based on your own conditions.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and is subject to the specific weather conditions of the day. If the hot air balloon ride is not possible due to weather conditions, a full refund will be provided!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this activity.
4. During the hot air balloon ride, the guide and team leader will not accompany you throughout the ride. Please wait in line patiently and avoid dangerous actions while boarding and disembarking to prevent accidents. Enjoy the flight and cherish the experience! $165 per person (2-3 people)

$150 per person (4 or more people)
The listed activities are suggested activities; guests can choose to participate on a "voluntary and self-funded" basis. If the number of participants is insufficient or resources are limited, some activities may not be available.

$50 per person (4-7 people)
$45 per person (8 people and above)
4x4 Jeep Dune Bashing$90 per person (4-7 people)Depart around 2:30 PM in a 4x4 vehicle from the hotel to experience dune bashing in the unique Eastern Desert of Egypt. Enjoy the vast desert, climb the sand dunes to watch the sunset, and visit an ancient Bedouin village to explore their lifestyle and enjoy a camel ride. If lucky, you might see a starry sky on the way back.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4x4 ride can be bumpy, and there are certain risks involved. Elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious! Ensure safety when getting on and off the camel! If the vehicle seats do not have safety belts, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90 per person (4-7 people)
$80 per person (8 people and above)
Includes: 4x4 Jeep rental, guide fees, entrance tickets, and BBQ dinner.
Giftun Island Tour$80 per person (10 or more people)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, board a yacht, and enter the beautiful Red Sea. The yacht is chartered exclusively for you, avoiding shared trips with other tourists, allowing you to fully enjoy the Red Sea scenery. Feed seagulls, go fishing, or snorkel as you wish. The yacht provides snorkeling gear and basic fishing equipment. A simple lunch is served on the boat. Includes pickup and drop-off, and Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking the yacht, queue in turn to avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery surfaces. Do not engage in risky actions before the captain and lifeguard make arrangements. Due to the fast speed of the yacht and the rough sea, elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious!
$80 per person (10 or more people)
Sinbad Submarine$115 per person (minimum 2 people)Travel to the dock to take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Board the submarine and dive 7 meters into the Red Sea to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will also perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to underwater pressure, elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious!
$115 per person (minimum 2 people)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum 4 people)Take a special custom boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the amazing underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.

$70 per person (minimum 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile. Fly over Habou Temple, the Temple of Karnak, the Valley of the Kings, and other sights for a unique experience of Luxor from above. title: 12-Day Group Tour of Morocco: Sahara Desert + Casablanca + Marrakech + Chefchaouen (4-star)
description: [World Encouragement] Celebrity All-Inclusive Package | No Visa Required | Maximum 25 People | Unique Desert Hotel with Stargazing + Casa Grande 5-Star Sheraton | Includes Camel Ride with Costume Show + Sahara 4x4 Adventure + YSL Garden Afternoon Tea + Performance Show | Trendy Restaurant
features:
[2020 Self-Operated Upgrade Package: 5-Star Nile River Cruise + Red Sea Resort + Ancient Civilization Exploration 12-Day Inland Flight Boutique Tour]

[25 People Cap Small Group | Added Thebes Ancient Capital Stay | Free Special Projects | More Comfortable Itinerary]

*Best-selling with excellent reviews for years, over 6000 travelers with outstanding feedback! Routes can be copied, quality cannot be compared, images can be plagiarized, reviews cannot be imitated*


☆[Upgrade Explanation]The 2020 star product has been upgraded again. Egypt, a once-in-a-lifetime destination, should not only be viewed superficially. Apart from food, accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, and entertainment, the key is professional Chinese-speaking tour guides. Our high-quality team of Chinese-speaking guides, with whom we have cooperated for many years, will ensure that your trip is worthwhile!

Winter Heavy Upgrade · New Trends in Group Travel

☆【Group Size Cap】Group size capped at 25 people, say goodbye to overcrowded mega groups!
☆【Stay in Luxor】One night accommodation by the Nile in Luxor, experience the ancient city of Thebes privately!

☆【Extended Tour】Extended 3-hour tour of the Egyptian Museum, no regrets!

☆【Special Features】Enjoy a morning carriage ride through the ancient city of Thebes and understand why so many movies favor Luxor!
☆【Special Arrangement】Learn to draw hieroglyphs and create your own papyrus artwork! (One piece per person)

☆【Bus Upgrade】Groups with more than 16 tourists will be upgraded to a Mercedes-Benz bus! Nothing is more important than travel safety!

 Classic Nile River Cruise - Seven Great Temples + Five Major Attractions

☆【Special Themes】Nile River Cruise Through Millennia of Civilization + Romantic Red Sea Vacation + Ancient Civilization Exploration!
☆【Five Major Attractions】Cairo + Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Alexandria - A True Panorama Tour!
☆【Seven Great Temples】Visit Six Classic Temples (Exclusive to Two Cruises) + Optional Abu Simbel Temple!
☆【Important Sights】Pyramids + Sphinx + Egyptian Museum - Don't Miss Any!

☆【Cruise Accommodation】3 nights on the Nile River cruise, a quality cruise we have been cooperating with for years (River view standard room)!

☆【Red Sea Resort】3 nights at a designated excellent resort by the Red Sea, a true vacation experience!

☆【Upgraded Domestic Flight】Upgrade to a domestic flight instead of taking a night train without a shower!

 Worry-free booking and traveling  Includes essential fees such as visa fees over a thousand yuan

☆【Convenient Visa】Group visa on arrival, no original passport required, no documents needed!
☆【Includes Tips】Includes a 900 RMB tip for the guide service + Nile River cruise service fee!
☆【Worry-Free Meals】Includes full meals throughout Egypt, no self-arranged meals, worry-free!

☆【Safety Assurance】Years of cooperation with well-known local ground operators + high-quality licensed guide team!

☆【Service Equipment】In-car WiFi to meet your internet needs!


Special Notice: To enrich the travel experience, starting today, the Nile River sailing project will be replaced with a morning carriage tour of the ancient city of Thebes in Luxor. Changes will not be separately notified.

description: Ctrip Exclusive Tour: No Shopping & No Extra Fees. Saigon (Ho Chi Minh City) - Little Paris + Mui Ne Red and White Sand Dunes + City Tour, Lotus Buffet & Conical Hat & Drip Coffee & Nha Trang Seafood Meal. 'A+B Line: Nha Trang Segment Up to 2 Nights at 5-Star Hotels, +1 Yuan for Mud Bath'
features:
[2020 Self-Operated Upgrade Package: 5-Star Nile River Cruise + Red Sea Resort + Ancient Civilization Exploration 12-Day Inland Flight Boutique Tour]

[25 People Cap Small Group | Added Thebes Ancient Capital Stay | Free Special Projects | More Comfortable Itinerary]

*Best-selling with excellent reviews for years, over 6000 travelers with outstanding feedback! Routes can be copied, quality cannot be compared, images can be plagiarized, reviews cannot be imitated*


☆[Upgrade Explanation]The 2020 star product has been upgraded again. Egypt, a once-in-a-lifetime destination, should not only be viewed superficially. Apart from food, accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, and entertainment, the key is professional Chinese-speaking tour guides. Our high-quality team of Chinese-speaking guides, with whom we have cooperated for many years, will ensure that your trip is worthwhile!

Winter Heavy Upgrade · New Trends in Group Travel

☆【Group Size Cap】Group size capped at 25 people, say goodbye to overcrowded mega groups!
☆【Stay in Luxor】One night accommodation by the Nile in Luxor, experience the ancient city of Thebes privately!

☆【Extended Tour】Extended 3-hour tour of the Egyptian Museum, no regrets!

☆【Special Features】Enjoy a morning carriage ride through the ancient city of Thebes and understand why so many movies favor Luxor!
☆【Special Arrangement】Learn to draw hieroglyphs and create your own papyrus artwork! (One piece per person)

☆【Bus Upgrade】Groups with more than 16 tourists will be upgraded to a Mercedes-Benz bus! Nothing is more important than travel safety!

 Classic Nile River Cruise - Seven Great Temples + Five Major Attractions

☆【Special Themes】Nile River Cruise Through Millennia of Civilization + Romantic Red Sea Vacation + Ancient Civilization Exploration!
☆【Five Major Attractions】Cairo + Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Alexandria - A True Panorama Tour!
☆【Seven Great Temples】Visit Six Classic Temples (Exclusive to Two Cruises) + Optional Abu Simbel Temple!
☆【Important Sights】Pyramids + Sphinx + Egyptian Museum - Don't Miss Any!

☆【Cruise Accommodation】3 nights on the Nile River cruise, a quality cruise we have been cooperating with for years (River view standard room)!

☆【Red Sea Resort】3 nights at a designated excellent resort by the Red Sea, a true vacation experience!

☆【Upgraded Domestic Flight】Upgrade to a domestic flight instead of taking a night train without a shower!

 Worry-free booking and traveling  Includes essential fees such as visa fees over a thousand yuan

☆【Convenient Visa】Group visa on arrival, no original passport required, no documents needed!
☆【Includes Tips】Includes a 900 RMB tip for the guide service + Nile River cruise service fee!
☆【Worry-Free Meals】Includes full meals throughout Egypt, no self-arranged meals, worry-free!

☆【Safety Assurance】Years of cooperation with well-known local ground operators + high-quality licensed guide team!

☆【Service Equipment】In-car WiFi to meet your internet needs!


Special Notice: To enrich the travel experience, starting today, the Nile River sailing project will be replaced with a morning carriage tour of the ancient city of Thebes in Luxor. Changes will not be separately notified.

推荐活动参考 （需自费）
ActivityReference PriceDescription
Philae Temple Sound and Light Show$70 per person (2-5 people)$70 per person (2-5 people) $65 per person (6-9 people) $60 per person (10 or more people). The price includes: transportation, guide fee, and attraction tickets.
Pyramid Sound and Light Show$75 per person (2-5 people)Experience the historical grandeur of over 4,000 years ago with a modern combination of sound and light. Includes pickup and drop-off service, Chinese-speaking guide, and tickets.
$75 per person (2-5 people)
$65 per person (6 or more people)
Nile River Night Cruise$85 per person (4-9 people)Enjoy a nighttime cruise on the Nile River, admire the scenery on both sides, and have dinner on board (excluding alcoholic beverages). Enjoy local performances (performances are paused during Ramadan). Includes dock pickup and drop-off service, and Chinese-speaking guide service.
$85 per person (4-9 people)
$75 per person (10 or more people)
Abu Simbel Temple$145/personDepart around 4 AM, traveling to and from with a desert security team. Abu Simbel Temple is a highlight of Aswan. It was built by the great Pharaoh Ramses II of ancient Egypt and is a protected site from the New Kingdom era. Includes transportation, Chinese-speaking tour guide and explanation services, and entrance tickets.
$145/person (6-9 people)
$140/person (10-14 people)
$125/person (15 people and above)
Aswan Nubian Village Tour$50/person (4-7 people)Take a small boat to Aswan's unique "minority" village—Nubian Village. Experience the ancient Nubian civilization, visit the colorful houses of the Nubians, learn the local language, and tour the homes. Includes dock pickup and drop-off, Chinese-speaking tour guide, Nubian village special drinks, and camel rides.
$50/person (4-7 people)
$45/person (8 people and above)
4WD Desert Safari$90/person (4-7 people)Depart from the hotel around 2:30 PM in a 4WD vehicle, heading to the eastern desert for a unique sand dune experience. Enjoy the vast desert, climb sand dunes to watch the sunset, and visit an ancient Bedouin village to learn about their lifestyle. Experience camel rides and, if lucky, see a starry sky on the return trip.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4WD ride can be bumpy and carries certain risks; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully! Ensure safety when riding camels! If seat belts are not provided in the vehicle, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90/person (4-7 people)
$80/person (8 people and above)
Includes: 4x4 jeep fee, guide fee, entrance tickets, BBQ dinner.
Giftun Island Tour$80/person (10 people and above)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, and board a yacht to the beautiful Red Sea. Enjoy a private boat trip without sharing with other tourists. Feed seagulls, go fishing, or snorkel as you wish. The yacht provides snorkeling equipment and basic fishing gear. Enjoy a simple lunch on board. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking from the yacht. Queue properly, avoid crowding, and watch for slippery conditions. Do not perform risky actions until the captain and lifeguard give instructions. The yacht moves quickly and the sea can be rough; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$80/person (10 people and above)
Sinbad Submarine$115/person (2 people and above)Travel to the dock and take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Dive 7 meters deep into the Red Sea in a submarine to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to the pressure underwater, elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$115/person (2 people and above)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)Take a specially customized boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the wonderful underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.
Note:
Please pay attention to safety when boarding and disembarking; queue in an orderly manner, avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery areas.
$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile River. The boat is equipped with hot coffee, tea, and snacks. Ride the hot air balloon to watch the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different view of Luxor from the sky, passing by Habou Temple, the Temple of the Queen, and the Valley of the Kings. A small celebration ceremony will be held after landing, and certificates will be awarded to guests. A special car will return you to the hotel.
Special Notes:
1. Hot air ballooning is a high-risk activity; please choose to participate based on your own conditions.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and is subject to the specific weather conditions of the day. If the hot air balloon ride is not possible due to weather conditions, a full refund will be provided!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this activity.
4. During the hot air balloon ride, the guide and team leader will not accompany you throughout the ride. Please wait in line patiently and avoid dangerous actions while boarding and disembarking to prevent accidents. Enjoy the flight and cherish the experience! $165 per person (2-3 people)

$150 per person (4 or more people)
The listed activities are suggested activities; guests can choose to participate on a "voluntary and self-funded" basis. If the number of participants is insufficient or resources are limited, some activities may not be available.

Experience the ancient Nubian civilization, visit the colorful houses of the Nubian people, learn the local language, and visit local homes. Includes dock pickup and drop-off service, Chinese-speaking tour guide, Nubian village specialty drinks, and camel rides.
$50 per person (4-7 people)
$45 per person (8 people and above)
4x4 Jeep Dune Bashing$90 per person (4-7 people)Depart around 2:30 PM in a 4x4 vehicle from the hotel to experience dune bashing in the unique Eastern Desert of Egypt. Enjoy the vast desert, climb the sand dunes to watch the sunset, and visit an ancient Bedouin village to explore their lifestyle and enjoy a camel ride. If lucky, you might see a starry sky on the way back.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4x4 ride can be bumpy, and there are certain risks involved. Elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious! Ensure safety when getting on and off the camel! If the vehicle seats do not have safety belts, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90 per person (4-7 people)
$80 per person (8 people and above)
Includes: 4x4 Jeep rental, guide fees, entrance tickets, and BBQ dinner.
Giftun Island Tour$80 per person (10 or more people)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, board a yacht, and enter the beautiful Red Sea. The yacht is chartered exclusively for you, avoiding shared trips with other tourists, allowing you to fully enjoy the Red Sea scenery. Feed seagulls, go fishing, or snorkel as you wish. The yacht provides snorkeling gear and basic fishing equipment. A simple lunch is served on the boat. Includes pickup and drop-off, and Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking the yacht, queue in turn to avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery surfaces. Do not engage in risky actions before the captain and lifeguard make arrangements. Due to the fast speed of the yacht and the rough sea, elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious!
$80 per person (10 or more people)
Sinbad Submarine$115 per person (minimum 2 people)Travel to the dock to take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Board the submarine and dive 7 meters into the Red Sea to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will also perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to underwater pressure, elderly, children, and those with health conditions should be cautious!
$115 per person (minimum 2 people)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum 4 people)Take a special custom boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the amazing underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.
Note:
Pay attention to safety when boarding and disembarking. Queue in order without crowding, and be careful of slipping.
$70 per person (minimum 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile. Hot coffee, tea, and snacks are provided on the boat. Take a hot air balloon ride to watch the sunrise and view Luxor. Fly over Habou Temple, the Temple of Karnak, the Valley of the Kings, and other sights for a unique experience of Luxor from above. After landing, a small celebration will be held, and certificates will be awarded to the guests. Then, a private car will return you to the hotel.
Special Notes:
1. Hot air ballooning is a high-risk activity; please choose to participate based on your own condition.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and depends on the specific weather conditions of the day. If the hot air balloon ride cannot be conducted due to weather conditions, the full price will be refunded!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this activity.
4. During the hot air balloon ride, the tour leader and guide will not accompany you. Please wait in order when boarding and disembarking from the balloon. Avoid making dangerous movements in a hurry to prevent accidents. Enjoy your flight and cherish the experience! $165 per person (2-3 people)

$150 per person (4 or more people)

$75 per person (2-5 people)
$65 per person (6 or more people)
Nile River Night Cruise$85 per person (4-9 people)Enjoy a nighttime cruise on the Nile River, admire the scenery on both sides, and have dinner on board (excluding alcoholic beverages). $85 per person (4-9 people)
$75 per person (10 or more people)
Abu Simbel Temple$145/personDepart around 4 AM, traveling to and from with a desert security team. Abu Simbel Temple is a highlight of Aswan. Includes transportation, Chinese-speaking tour guide and explanation services, and entrance tickets.
$145/person (6-9 people)
$140/person (10-14 people)
$125/person (15 people and above)
Aswan Nubian Village Tour$50/person (4-7 people)Take a small boat to Aswan's unique "minority" village—Nubian Village. Experience the ancient Nubian civilization, visit the colorful houses of the Nubians, learn the local language, and tour the homes. Includes dock pickup and drop-off, Chinese-speaking tour guide, Nubian village special drinks, and camel rides.
$50/person (4-7 people)
$45/person (8 people and above)
4WD Desert Safari$90/person (4-7 people)Depart from the hotel around 2:30 PM in a 4WD vehicle, heading to the eastern desert for a unique sand dune experience. Enjoy the vast desert, climb sand dunes to watch the sunset, and visit an ancient Bedouin village to learn about their lifestyle. Experience camel rides and, if lucky, see a starry sky on the return trip.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4WD ride can be bumpy and carries certain risks; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully! Ensure safety when riding camels! If seat belts are not provided in the vehicle, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90/person (4-7 people)
$80/person (8 people and above)
Includes: 4x4 jeep fee, guide fee, entrance tickets, BBQ dinner.
Giftun Island Tour$80/person (10 people and above)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, and board a yacht to the beautiful Red Sea. Enjoy a private boat trip without sharing with other tourists. Feed seagulls, go fishing, or snorkel as you wish. The yacht provides snorkeling equipment and basic fishing gear. Enjoy a simple lunch on board. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking from the yacht. Queue properly, avoid crowding, and watch for slippery conditions. Do not perform risky actions until the captain and lifeguard give instructions. The yacht moves quickly and the sea can be rough; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$80/person (10 people and above)
Sinbad Submarine$115/person (2 people and above)Travel to the dock and take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Dive 7 meters deep into the Red Sea in a submarine to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to the pressure underwater, elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$115/person (2 people and above)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)Take a specially customized boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the wonderful underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.
Note:
Please pay attention to safety when boarding and disembarking; queue in an orderly manner, avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery areas.
$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile River. The boat is equipped with hot coffee, tea, and snacks. Ride the hot air balloon to watch the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different view of Luxor from the sky, passing by Habou Temple, the Temple of the Queen, and the Valley of the Kings. A small celebration ceremony will be held after landing, and certificates will be awarded to guests. A special car will return you to the hotel.
Special Notes:
1. Hot air ballooning is a high-risk activity; please choose to participate based on your own conditions.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and is subject to the specific weather conditions of the day. If the hot air balloon ride is not possible due to weather conditions, a full refund will be provided!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this activity.
4. During the hot air balloon ride, the guide and team leader will not accompany you throughout the ride. Please wait in line patiently and avoid dangerous actions while boarding and disembarking to prevent accidents. Enjoy the flight and cherish the experience! $165 per person (2-3 people)

$150 per person (4 or more people)

title: 7 Days 5 Nights Private Tour in Bali, Indonesia (5 Star)
description: A-line independent pool villa · Optional trendy floating breakfast · 3 nights by the sea at 'Hilton/Melia/Anantara' · B-line 3 nights in a sea view room at 'Conrad/Yulou/Sheraton' · C-line star package 'Ayana Resort · Infinity pool · Cliff bar' · DE-line hotel selection
features:
[2020 Self-Operated Upgrade Package: 5-Star Nile River Cruise + Red Sea Resort + Ancient Civilization Exploration 12-Day Inland Flight Boutique Tour]

[25 People Cap Small Group | Added Thebes Ancient Capital Stay | Free Special Projects | More Comfortable Itinerary]

*Best-selling with excellent reviews for years, over 6000 travelers with outstanding feedback! Routes can be copied, quality cannot be compared, images can be plagiarized, reviews cannot be imitated*


☆[Upgrade Explanation]The 2020 star product has been upgraded again. Egypt, a once-in-a-lifetime destination, should not only be viewed superficially. Apart from food, accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, and entertainment, the key is professional Chinese-speaking tour guides. Our high-quality team of Chinese-speaking guides, with whom we have cooperated for many years, will ensure that your trip is worthwhile!

Winter Heavy Upgrade · New Trends in Group Travel

☆【Group Size Cap】Group size capped at 25 people, say goodbye to overcrowded mega groups!
☆【Stay in Luxor】One night accommodation by the Nile in Luxor, experience the ancient city of Thebes privately!

☆【Extended Tour】Extended 3-hour tour of the Egyptian Museum, no regrets!

☆【Special Features】Enjoy a morning carriage ride through the ancient city of Thebes and understand why so many movies favor Luxor!
☆【Special Arrangement】Learn to draw hieroglyphs and create your own papyrus artwork! (One piece per person)

☆【Bus Upgrade】Groups with more than 16 tourists will be upgraded to a Mercedes-Benz bus! Nothing is more important than travel safety!

 Classic Nile River Cruise - Seven Great Temples + Five Major Attractions

☆【Special Themes】Nile River Cruise Through Millennia of Civilization + Romantic Red Sea Vacation + Ancient Civilization Exploration!
☆【Five Major Attractions】Cairo + Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Alexandria - A True Panorama Tour!
☆【Seven Great Temples】Visit Six Classic Temples (Exclusive to Two Cruises) + Optional Abu Simbel Temple!
☆【Important Sights】Pyramids + Sphinx + Egyptian Museum - Don't Miss Any!

☆【Cruise Accommodation】3 nights on the Nile River cruise, a quality cruise we have been cooperating with for years (River view standard room)!

☆【Red Sea Resort】3 nights at a designated excellent resort by the Red Sea, a true vacation experience!

☆【Upgraded Domestic Flight】Upgrade to a domestic flight instead of taking a night train without a shower!

 Worry-free booking and traveling  Includes essential fees such as visa fees over a thousand yuan

☆【Convenient Visa】Group visa on arrival, no original passport required, no documents needed!
☆【Includes Tips】Includes a 900 RMB tip for the guide service + Nile River cruise service fee!
☆【Worry-Free Meals】Includes full meals throughout Egypt, no self-arranged meals, worry-free!

☆【Safety Assurance】Years of cooperation with well-known local ground operators + high-quality licensed guide team!

☆【Service Equipment】In-car WiFi to meet your internet needs!


Special Notice: To enrich the travel experience, starting today, the Nile River sailing project will be replaced with a morning carriage tour of the ancient city of Thebes in Luxor. Changes will not be separately notified.

Winter Heavy Upgrade · New Trends in Group Travel

☆【Group Size Cap】Group size capped at 25 people, say goodbye to overcrowded mega groups!
☆【Stay in Luxor】One night accommodation by the Nile in Luxor, experience the ancient city of Thebes privately!

☆【Extended Tour】Extended 3-hour tour of the Egyptian Museum, no regrets!

☆【Special Features】Enjoy a morning carriage ride through the ancient city of Thebes and understand why so many movies favor Luxor!
☆【Special Arrangement】Learn to draw hieroglyphs and create your own papyrus artwork! (One piece per person)

☆【Bus Upgrade】Groups with more than 16 tourists will be upgraded to a Mercedes-Benz bus! Nothing is more important than travel safety!

 Classic Nile River Cruise - Seven Great Temples + Five Major Attractions

☆【Special Themes】Nile River Cruise Through Millennia of Civilization + Romantic Red Sea Vacation + Ancient Civilization Exploration!
☆【Five Major Attractions】Cairo + Aswan + Luxor + Red Sea + Alexandria - A True Panorama Tour!
☆【Seven Great Temples】Visit Six Classic Temples (Exclusive to Two Cruises) + Optional Abu Simbel Temple!
☆【Important Sights】Pyramids + Sphinx + Egyptian Museum - Don't Miss Any!

☆【Cruise Accommodation】3 nights on the Nile River cruise, a quality cruise we have been cooperating with for years (River view standard room)!

☆【Red Sea Resort】3 nights at a designated excellent resort by the Red Sea, a true vacation experience!

☆【Upgraded Domestic Flight】Upgrade to a domestic flight instead of taking a night train without a shower!

 Worry-free booking and traveling  Includes essential fees such as visa fees over a thousand yuan

☆【Convenient Visa】Group visa on arrival, no original passport required, no documents needed!
☆【Includes Tips】Includes a 900 RMB tip for the guide service + Nile River cruise service fee!
☆【Worry-Free Meals】Includes full meals throughout Egypt, no self-arranged meals, worry-free!

☆【Safety Assurance】Years of cooperation with well-known local ground operators + high-quality licensed guide team!

☆【Service Equipment】In-car WiFi to meet your internet needs!


Special Notice: To enrich the travel experience, starting today, the Nile River sailing project will be replaced with a morning carriage tour of the ancient city of Thebes in Luxor. Changes will not be separately notified.

$65 per person (6 or more people)

$85 per person (4-9 people)
$75 per person (10 or more people)

$145/person (6-9 people)
$140/person (10-14 people)
$125/person (15 people and above)

$50/person (4-7 people)
$45/person (8 people and above)

Experience camel rides and, if lucky, see a starry sky on the return trip.
Note: This is an adventurous activity. The 4WD ride can be bumpy and carries certain risks; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully! Ensure safety when riding camels! If seat belts are not provided in the vehicle, refuse to board and request a refund!
$90/person (4-7 people)
$80/person (8 people and above)

Giftun Island Tour$80/person (10 people and above)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 AM, head to the dock, and board a yacht to the beautiful Red Sea. Enjoy a simple lunch on board. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
Be cautious when boarding and disembarking from the yacht. Queue properly, avoid crowding, and watch for slippery conditions. Do not perform risky actions until the captain and lifeguard give instructions. The yacht moves quickly and the sea can be rough; elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$80/person (10 people and above)
Sinbad Submarine$115/person (2 people and above)Travel to the dock and take a speedboat to the submarine platform. Dive 7 meters deep into the Red Sea in a submarine to admire the mysterious and beautiful underwater world. A diver will perform a fish-feeding show underwater. Includes pickup and drop-off, and a Chinese-speaking tour guide.
Note:
This is an adventurous activity. Due to the pressure underwater, elderly, weak, children, and those with health conditions should consider carefully!
$115/person (2 people and above)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)Take a specially customized boat with large viewing windows on the bottom to enjoy the wonderful underwater world. Includes pickup and drop-off, with a Chinese-speaking guide.
Note:
Please pay attention to safety when boarding and disembarking; queue in an orderly manner, avoid crowding, and be careful of slippery areas.
$70 per person (minimum of 4 people)
Luxor Hot Air Balloon$165 per person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel around 5 AM to the dock, then take a small boat to the west bank of the Nile River. The boat is equipped with hot coffee, tea, and snacks. Ride the hot air balloon to watch the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different view of Luxor from the sky, passing by Habou Temple, the Temple of the Queen, and the Valley of the Kings. A small celebration ceremony will be held after landing, and certificates will be awarded to guests. A special car will return you to the hotel.
Special Notes:
1. Hot air ballooning is a high-risk activity; please choose to participate based on your own conditions.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and is subject to the specific weather conditions of the day. If the hot air balloon ride is not possible due to weather conditions, a full refund will be provided!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this activity.
4. During the hot air balloon ride, the guide and team leader will not accompany you throughout the ride. Please wait in line patiently and avoid dangerous actions while boarding and disembarking to prevent accidents. Enjoy the flight and cherish the experience! $165 per person (2-3 people)

$150 per person (4 or more people)
